sentence.Network_en: He has lots of original ideas about the research into microelectronics.

sentence.Network_en: It would be a natural evolution of microelectronics to become nanoelectronics.
sentence.Network_cn: 它是从微电子学到奈米电子学的自然演进.

sentence.Network_en: In control technology, greater use of computer technology and microelectronics.
sentence.Network_cn: 在控制技术上, 更多地应用计算机技术和微电子技术.
